values.comment: N'Zoth's First Mate --> Coin --> Southsea Deckhand
values.condition: my_hand(count(), cardid=GAME_005) > 0 AND my_hero(count(), max_mana=1, mana=1) > 0

values.comment: Coin --> Bloodsail Cultist if you have a weapon and a pirate.
values.condition: my_hand(count(), cardid=GAME_005) > 0 AND my_hero(count(), max_mana = 2, mana = 2) > 0 AND my_hero(count(), weapon) > 0 AND my_minions(count(), pirate = true) > 0

values.comment: N'Zoth's First Mate --> coin --> Upgrade! without weapon in hand
values.condition: my_hand(count(), cardid=GAME_005) > 0 AND my_hero(count(), max_mana) == 1 AND my_hand(count(), weapon) < 1

values.comment: Coin --> Fledgeling if the board is empty on turn 2.
values.condition: my_hand(count(), cardid=GAME_005) > 0 AND my_hero(count(), max_mana) == 2 AND opp_minions(count()) < 1

values.comment: Coin --> Frothing Berserker if my minion count > 2.
values.condition: my_hand(count(), cardid=GAME_005) > 0 AND my_hero(count(), max_mana = 2, mana = 2) > 0
